https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/avEe9acL57qiw4kMblKEpm7Jlae.jpg Javier must reintegrate into society after spending 14 years in prison. His family and friends reject him, so he takes refuge in a house where he rents a room. There he meets Amanda, who helps him find a way to reunite with his teenage daughter that he barely knows. Anónimo
